Summary: Saw something shoot down from sky (fast) then turn into orb and slowly descend . Stopped and shot away!
divs: Sighting DetailsI was standing on my front porch with my wife as we always do to smoke a cig. I was looking in sky and watched this thing fall and come to complete stop in mid air , I told her to look she then saw what turned into a white orb or bubble . Then it moved down slowly and in a matter of 20 seconds shoot off into sky in different direction. This was def a UFO or entity stopping to see what this planet has to offer then gone!
trends: There has been one other sighting in Danville
There were no other sightings in Danville on or around March 12th 2013
